This chunk sets up the collision detection system in the DistancePhasedNode class. It appends a new collision sphere node to a list and initializes a CollisionTraverser with an event handler if a fromCollideNode is provided, enabling enter/exit events for distance-based phase transitions.

self._colSpheres.append(cSphereNodePath)
        if self.fromCollideNode:
            self.cTrav = CollisionTraverser()
            cHandler = CollisionHandlerEvent()
            cHandler.addInPattern(self.enterPrefix + '%in')
            cHandler.addOutPattern(self.exitPrefix + '%in')
            self.cTrav.addCollider(self.fromCollideNode,cHandler)
